text: the way this thing came about was there
is a big military laboratory in Utah and
that laboratory sent a batch of what it
thought was irradiated killed anthrax if
you like 29 laboratories in the US and
this big base in South Korea and
apparently it did it by not necessarily
the regular postal system but regular
courier systems like FedEx that kind of
thing it thought the stuff was dead it
wasn't dead it was discovered to be
alive and virulent in one of those
laboratories and then the authorities
said well we've got to find out where
the rest of stuff is so clearly there
has been a danger now having said all
that the Pentagon is adamant that that
danger has been spotted and controlled
and ended but clearly something went
pretty wrong
